turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to place an order for carry out at Papa Johns.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What Papa John's location are you wanting to pick this order up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at 515 S Reed Rd in Kokomo, IN.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 1 large pepperoni pizza, 1 large cheese pizza, 1 order of breadsticks, and 1 2-liter of Sprite.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would those pizzas be thin crust, pan pizza, or traditional crusts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like both to be traditional crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what dipping sauce would you like for your breadsticks. Would you like marinara or cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like cheese please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, can I add anything else to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, yes please. I would like to add 3 additional cheese sauces

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Does that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, let me confirm your order. You would like 1 large pepperoni pizza with traditional crust, 1 large cheese pizza with traditional crust, 1 order of breadsticks with cheese sauce, 3 cups of cheese sauce, and 1 2-liter of Sprite. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.

items.name: 515 S Reed Rd in Kokomo, IN
